title: Apache NiFi 2.0.0: Building Python Processors
author: Robert Kimani
description: Python processors built in the latest version of Apache NiFi can streamline data processing tasks, enhance flexibility and speed up development.
cntitle: Apache NiFi 2.0.0：构建 Python 处理器
cndescription: Apache NiFi 最新版本中内置的 Python 处理器可以简化数据处理任务，增强灵活性并加快开发速度。
